channel.title: Some exciting stuff
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/behind-the-scenes-special-edition
Everything is sounding great, I'm excited to see all this come to the game.
What are your opinions or ideas on the upcoming content?

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

Featuring our innovative new browser-based technology and with big investments in graphics and gameplay, RuneScape is set to take a monumental leap forward in 2013. Higher visual and audio fidelity, improved camera mechanics and a much more customisable interface system are but a taste of what you can expect.

And there, comes oldschool options

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

The player owned ports really does sound great. However, they didn’t really go into any amount of detail which has left my mind wandering to idiotic conclusions about how far they’re going to take it. I’m not much of a fan of the leveling up weapons though, they’re veering too far away from RuneScape and becoming more of a generic MMORPG. Not to say some won’t like it, but it’s just not for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Owner-X:

Taharok, do you happen to know what one of these skills might be? I’m very interested, and want to get a head start so I know how to prepare.

No clue. I’m out of most of the gossip loop these days. If you want to get any hints, join chats like mod mark’s or mod mmg’s. RS Wikia usually has a bunch of tidbits they gather from jmods too, but the regulars in those channels will know more.

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:22, topic:468900”]The construction stuff is what I’m most interested in, though by the sound of it, I may have wasted 150m on my house this year.[/quote]I really hope they don’t make us start over… don’t want all mine to go to waste either D:

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I lost interest in the direction runescape is going. It doesn’t appeal to me anymore. I liked the pre 525 revisions. Mostly 508.

Read full topic

Riip, I would at least give it a try. With two new skills coming up, why not see how they are?

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Also noting that one of those skills were supposed to be released at the end of 2011/beginning of 2012. Jagex is quite behind in their content.

The construction stuff is what I’m most interested in, though by the sound of it, I may have wasted 150m on my house this year.

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:15, topic:468900”][quote]Level Up my Stuff (all)

The ability to actually level up your equipment while training would be great! You could even customise that equipment by choosing from a range of buffs and bonuses that not only effected your stats but also the cosmetic look of the equipment - perhaps even name it. We wouldn’t limit ourselves to only allowing combat equipment to be levelled – far from it. It could affect your training gear like axes or hatchets; even summoning creatures, too.[/quote]It was all good until I saw this.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[u][b]Level Up my Stuff (all)[/b][/u]

The ability to actually level up your equipment while training would be great! You could even customise that equipment by choosing from a range of buffs and bonuses that not only effected your stats but also the cosmetic look of the equipment - perhaps even name it. We wouldn’t limit ourselves to only allowing combat equipment to be levelled – far from it. It could affect your training gear like axes or hatchets; even summoning creatures, too.

It was all good until I saw this.

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @Owner-X Owner-X
item.description:
@Owner-X wrote:

KroniKz_:

This is why i quit rsps and got back into runescape, it’s starting to get really good. Something must’ve gotten into Jagex… Great job jagex, can’t wait!

I’m going to be doing both at the same time, but more so with RuneScape. Can’t wait for these updates.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Davidi2:

2013 sounds like a great year!

You are not allowed to say that. We all know that Jagex should revert the game back to 2006.

Something on the list sounds really good, I might begin to play the game again.

Loveandpower:

[quote]Two brand new skills await you in 2013, with one new resource collection skill and a support skill which will be modelled on some of our oldest and dearest content. Designed to suit the old-school, yet complement the entire game.

yay sailing! should be interesting to see how they put that into dungeoneering.[/quote]
It would be a nice Easter egg, have a NPC who will help you learn sailing, but demand an unreachable requirement.

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:8, topic:468900”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=585912.msg4160883#msg4160883 date=1353097689]
I hope that they are talking about finishing the elf series too, Priffindinas (or however you spell it), has been un-used for much too long!
[/quote]

From what I have heard from rumors around RuneScape, they are supposed to be finishing that quite soon. With the release of a new Grand Exchange.[/quote]Nah, that was just RuneShark saying what he wanted to see. I also saw that video. He said it would be nice if it was used as like a members version of Varrock, I dont think Jagex said anything about it though (GE-wise), but it does sound like they might be finishing up this area, we just don’t have any source for it besides this BTS.

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @Owner-X Owner-X
item.description:
@Owner-X wrote:

Really excited for a new RuneScape, unlike most veterans.
If course, I miss the 2006-2008 RuneScape as much as the next guy, but COME ON, TWO new skills? P-O-P? New grandmaster quests? This will almost be as good as…well…I feel this will be the best update yet.
Also, that quest with the varrock dog was a twist, wasn’t expecting that. Though I am glad they are putting that poor dog to some use.

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Two brand new skills await you in 2013, with one new resource collection skill and a support skill which will be modelled on some of our oldest and dearest content. Designed to suit the old-school, yet complement the entire game.

yay sailing! should be interesting to see how they put that into dungeoneering.

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Davidi2:

I hope that they are talking about finishing the elf series too, Priffindinas (or however you spell it), has been un-used for much too long!

From what I have heard from rumors around RuneScape, they are supposed to be finishing that quite soon. With the release of a new Grand Exchange.

Read full topic

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I hope that they are talking about finishing the elf series too, Priffindinas (or however you spell it), has been un-used for much too long!

item.title: Some exciting stuff
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

I think my favorite is seeing how the did Sailing. I also am anxious to see what the graphics will look like when it is done. I do want to see what these 2 new skills are. They said it was keeping it old-school. I hope they are true to that.

2013 is going to be a good year to play runescape.

Read full topic
